associateSiteToWorkflowConfig

public void associateSiteToWorkflowConfig(java.util.List<StudySite> sites)
This method will associate StudySites to the AdverseEventReportingPeriod and ExpeditedAdverseEventReport workflow. The default assigned to AdverseEventReportingPeriod is reportingperiod_coordinating_center The default assigned to ExpeditedAdverseEventReport is expedited_domestic

Parameters:
sites - - A list of StudySite
